name: You're Mine
description:
A short prototype platformer made with the prompt "DEATH = PROGRESS".

You are an Eldrith terror that possesses the minds of hapless adventurers that venture into your dungeon - make them meet their doom at take their souls for your own! 

  • Arrow Keys = Movement
  • Space = Jump
  • CTRL = Restart Level 

Assets Credit:

  • Tilesets: Rotting Pixels, Yanin
  • Character: blackdragon1727
  • Fonts: GGBotNet, apicici
  •  Music and SFX: Psionic Games
